remarks: A substructure assigns the same values to the norms of elements of a subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
subgngp.h $e |- H = ( G |`s A ) $.
subgnm.n $e |- N = ( norm ` G ) $.
subgnm.m $e |- M = ( norm ` H ) $.
subgnm2 $p |- ( ( A e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. A ) -> ( M ` X ) = ( N ` X ) ) $.
